page.title: 08EDUCATION 14_18 (part 2)
page.content: Mr Evans is the principal of Countesthorpe College.He is not only in charge of 14_18 year old students, but about 3000 other people.His favourite part of his job is being busy.1100 students attend the college. They usually gain more than they lose,but 4th year areas are fuller than 5th,because most 5th year students leave after their exams. There is not strict discipline at Countesthorpe in the sense that they don't have a lot of rules.There are no school colours because adults use the school and they can't be told to wear uniform. The students have the same teachers for each subject.They are divided into small schools.The staff and pupils have a good relationship. The pupils call staff by christian names.The exam pass rate differs at Countesthorpe.
